com.facebook.buck.core.graph.transformation

Interface TransformationEnvironment<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>


  • public interface TransformationEnvironment<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>
    A computation environment that GraphTransformer can access. This class provides ability of Transformers to request and execute their dependencies on the engine, without exposing blocking operations.

    The implementations of this environment should have all methods as tail recursive and unblocking.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TransformationEnvironment.AsyncSink<KeyType,ResultType>
      Interface for use with evaluateAllAndCollectAsync(Iterable, AsyncSink)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Method used for GraphTransformer to get dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.

      Method used for GraphTransformer to get multiple dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        CompletionStage<ComputeResult> evaluate(ComputeKey key,
                                        Function<ComputeResult,ComputeResult> asyncTransformation)
        Method used for GraphTransformer to get dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key of the dependency to execute
        asyncTransformation - the async function to perform after dependency has completed
        Returns:
        a Future of the result of applying asyncTransformation to the completed dependency result

      • evaluateAll

        CompletionStage<ComputeResult> evaluateAll(Iterable<ComputeKey> keys,
                                           Function<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>,ComputeResult> asyncTransformation)
        Method used for GraphTransformer to get multiple dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.
        Parameters:
        keys - The keys of the dependency to consume
        asyncTransformation - The function to run after all dependencies are completed, where the result of dependencies are given as a map of the keys to the result
        Returns:
        a future of the result of applying asyncTransformation to the dependencies

      • evaluateAllAndCollectAsync

        CompletionStage<ComputeResult> evaluateAllAndCollectAsync(Iterable<ComputeKey> keys,
                                                          TransformationEnvironment.AsyncSink<ComputeKey,ComputeResult> sink)
        Method used for GraphTransformer to get multiple dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key. When any individual dependency result is done, TransformationEnvironment.AsyncSink.sink(Object, Object) is called with that result asynchronously. When all dependency results and corresponding calls to TransformationEnvironment.AsyncSink.sink(Object, Object) is completed, TransformationEnvironment.AsyncSink.collect() is called to obtain the final result.
        Parameters:
        keys - The keys of the dependency to consume
        sink - The sink of the dependency results which produces the final output
        Returns:
        a future of the result of applying sink to the dependencies
